tachyon.master

Class TachyonMaster

  • java.lang.Object
    • tachyon.master.TachyonMaster

  • public class TachyonMaster
extends Object
    Entry point for the Master program.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  TachyonMaster.Factory
      Factory for creating TachyonMaster or TachyonMasterFaultTolerant based on TachyonConf.
